programme.title: Hayman's Way
programme.desc: Follow David Hayman as he unearths the people and places that make Scotland unique.

programme.title: Raw Travel
programme.desc: Romania’s capital city often gets short shrift as travelers passing through aren’t aware of its hidden, if sometimes gritty, charms. The Raw Travel crew, with the help of some savvy locals, shows them just what they’ve been missing.

programme.title: The Colours of China
programme.desc: Five colours are an integral part of contemporary China and the ancient philosophy of Wu Xing. Each episode takes us to regions where we meet our characters, learn how Wu Xing sits in their lives and explore the landscapes they live in.

programme.title: Gourmet Escapes
programme.desc: Chef Gerardo D’Amore connects with Ireland’s own Martin Shanahan in Kinsale (Ireland’s culinary capital). His restaurant named “Fishy Fishy’” is known by all in Ireland. The daily catch is brought from the ocean that is at the front door of his restaurant, and on to the table. Gerardo gathers the ingredients with Martin and visit the local farmer, markets and casts out to sea. They even get the famous Irish whiskey and possibly do a little too much sampling at the distillery.

programme.title: It’s How You Get There
programme.desc: Sam Nehme, Julian Taylor and Jenn Barlow experience a variety of exciting modes of transportation as they journey across the country to see which one is best on, "It's How You Get There".

programme.title: American Travelers
programme.sub-title: American Travelers: New Zealand Australia Adventures
programme.desc: Dave and Kari take a cruise to New Zealand, Tasmania, and Australia.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Travel Thru History is a unique, Emmy nominated travel series that explores diverse cities and historical sites around the World while experiencing the cultural and archaeological features of these unique locations. From the oldest building in the Western Hemisphere to the famous French Quarter, a spectacular chain of islands off the Southern coast of Florida to the birthplace of California, the Travel Thru History series is a must see to learn about America's rich and fascinating history by traveling to amazing cities across the states. It explores diverse cities and historical sites while experiencing the cultural and archaeological features of these unique locations.
